artist: Engraver: Alexander Bannerman; Artist: After George Jamesone
description: family group with child at left, woman at center holding a rose,wearing a veil, man at right behind woman holding palette and brushes; half length; after a painting by Jamesone but in reverse
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: [Bannerman sculp./ GEORGE JAMESONE]; on sheet in pencil: [1-575]
title: Portrait of George Jamesone
